property.name: circleLabels
property.label: Circle Labels
property.description: A comma separated string of labels to show inside the circles

property.name: circleCounts
property.label: Circle Counts
property.description: A comma separated string of numbers or count values

property.name: visibilityKeys
property.label: Visibility Keys
property.description: A comma separated string of words used for component visibility

property.name: defaultSelectedKey
property.label: Default Selected Key
property.description: Optional: the visibility key to select by default when the component loads

property.name: selectedKey
property.label: Selected Visibility Key
property.description: The visibility key of the selected circle (returned to Flow). This is case-sensitive and must match exactly for Flow visibility filters.

property.name: enablePulse
property.label: Enable Pulse Animation
property.description: When true (default), circles with counts will pulse to draw attention. Set to false to disable this effect.
